hypothesis: CMA-ES finds good basin quickly. L-BFGS-B with few iterations can refine within the basin faster than NM. Even with finite differences, 2-3 L-BFGS-B iterations may beat 8 NM iterations.

tuning_runs.finding: Time OK but score WORSE (-0.019 vs baseline)
NM is better: +0.0241 score, -4.4 min vs L-BFGS-B x2

final_result: FAILED - L-BFGS-B polish is NOT better than NM polish
abort_reason: L-BFGS-B finite difference overhead (O(n) extra evals per iteration) outweighs gradient advantage. NM x8 achieves better score/time tradeoff than L-BFGS-B at any iteration count.
